← Releases

Missing.css Version 1.0.2

§ Changelog

  • Added the .big utility.

    You can use this class to make anything bigger. If added to an <aside>, it makes a pull quote.

  • Code will now be un-italicized when it's in an italic container (em, dfn, etc.). Add the .italic class or put the italic element inside the code element to undo this.

Missing.css, by Deniz Akşimşek, funded by Big Sky Software and Commspace.

Also check out htmx and _hyperscript.

Made with 💙 in Ankara, Samsun, Rize and Cape Town.
